document_data.caption: A white abishai.
document_data.name: White Abishai
document_data.subtype3e: [[Baatezu]], [[:Category:Creatures with the evil subtype|evil]], [[:Category:Creatures with the lawful subtype|lawful]]
document_data.mainbody: '''White abishai''' were the lowest-ranking of the [[abishai]] [[devil]]s
document_data.Abilities: The stingers of white abishai froze those they struck, contributing to their bestial claws and fangs.
document_data.Combat: White abishai were savage and reckless, attacking with their claws, if not with [[longsword]]s or [[flail]]s. They were fearless in battle and on the battlefield become incredibly dangerous.
document_data.Society: When Tiamat decided that a soul was worthy of serving her she transformed it through an agonizing process into a white abishai. White abishai reinforced the ranks of [[Tiamat]]'s legions with their fearless attitudes and combat prowess.
